page.title: 20LLANGURIG, ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: The gathering of information contained in pages 1 to 19 has been done in total by the junior children of{Llangurig Primary School.}The typing has all been done by{Robert {Gilman}aged 10. The other contributers were Edward Powell, Philip Abel, Rhian Dunford, Abigail Beasley, Janet Hughes, Gwen Davies, Bethan Wozencraft, Jemma Wheeler, Michelle Hamer, Hugh Richards, Wayne Price, Gareth Gower, Jonathan Grew, Nicky Howells, Philip Buckman, Joseph Gilman, Claire Hand, Bethan Davies, Melody Percival and Louise Hamer. { The headteacher was Mr J.T. Price.
